pages.text: Dispensers are modified so that it be possible to automate stew pots.
When a bowl is being dispensed, dispensers will try to fill the bowl with fluid in front of it: either in a container containing fluid, or a fluid block.
When a bowl of soup or a bucket of fluid is being dispensed, and in front of the dispenser is a fluid container, the dispenser will try to transfer fluid into the container.
